e_damage_avionics.name: Avionics Board: Possible Electronics-level Damage
solutions: Observe the error's persistence. If error goes away and does not persist, ignore.
If error persists replace the Avionics Board.

e_damage_esc_{MOTOR}.name: ESC {SAME[MOTOR]}: Electronics-level Damage
solutions: Observe the error's persistence. If error goes away and does not persist, ignore.
If error persists replace the ESC.

e_damage_radar_RF_board.name: Electronics-level Damage of the Radar's Internal Board
solutions: Observe the error's persistence. If error goes away and does not persist, ignore.
If error persists replace the Omnidirectional Radar Module.
